column5: GitHub Copilot for Business is now available, as we bring the world’s first at-scale AI developer tool to any organization.

As we reflect on the life of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. today, we’re honored to partner with @TheKingCenter to help preserve Mrs. Coretta Scott King’s legacy, including her role in championing today’s federal holiday, as well as nonviolent social change. https://t.co/AS4bBN3DXN
Aligning the entire organization on the most important work is critical – and we’re making this easier than ever with Viva Goals.

@MSFTImagine Congratulations again, Team V Bionic! It was great to witness your passion for using technology to make a difference in the lives of those with hand paralysis – and I’m greatly looking forward to seeing what comes next for all of you and the impact you will have.

Thank you @narendramodi for an insightful meeting. It’s fantastic to be back in India this week, meeting with so many innovators and changemakers, like these employees at @TheOfficialSBI who are using technology to make a difference at their organization – and across the country.

Our strategic partnership will bring together the industry leadership of @LSEGplc with the trust and breadth of the Microsoft Cloud to deliver next generation services that will empower the future of financial markets.

This International Day of Persons with Disabilities is an opportunity for all of us to learn and take action for inclusion. Thanks to my colleagues for sharing these powerful stories.

"The programmer, like the poet, works only slightly removed from pure thought-stuff." RIP Fred Brooks. Your work and your words will continue to inspire generations of software and systems professionals.
It’s time to transform supply chain operations. That’s why we’re bringing together data, AI, and collaboration to tackle customers’ most urgent supply chain issues.
This Veterans Day we honor the sacrifice and contributions of those who answer the call to military service – and the positive impact they have at Microsoft, as well as in their local communities.

Congratulations to the grand prize winners of this year's Global Hackathon! I am inspired by how you have applied your passion to a worthwhile purpose: developing a way for people to help their loved ones use technology more easily. https://t.co/0UXoLZOOKT
From Copilot for business to Codespaces for all, at GitHub Universe we’re bringing our breakthrough offerings to even more organizations and developers around the world.

People with disabilities continue to be underrepresented in part because their needs and demographics aren’t widely counted. We’re working with the World Bank and other partners to help address this critical data challenge.
